verses.verse: Peter, <S%G4074><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to the chosen ones who are living as foreigners <S%G3927><s%> in the Dispersion in <S%G1290><s%> Pontus, <S%G4195><s%> Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Cappadocia, <S%G2587><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Bithynia, <S%G1588><s%>

according to <S%G2596><s%> the foreknowledge <S%G4268><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> that <S%G1519><s%> you may obey <S%G5218><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be sprinkled <S%G4473><s%> with his blood: <S%G129><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> be multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> became <S%G313><s%> our <S%G2248><s%> father again <S%G313><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> a living <S%G2198><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%>

to <S%G1519><s%> an incorruptible <S%G862><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> undefiled <S%G283><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> that <S%G2532><s%> doesn't <S%G263><s%> fade away, reserved <S%G5083><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%>

who <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> are guarded <S%G5432><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a salvation <S%G4991><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to be revealed <S%G601><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> you greatly rejoice, <S%G21><s%> though now <S%G737><s%> for a little while, <S%G3641><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> need be, <S%G1163><s%> you have been <S%G2076><s%> put to grief <S%G3076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> various <S%G4164><s%> trials, <S%G3986><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> the proof <S%G1383><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> which is more <S%G4183><s%> precious <S%G5093><s%> than gold <S%G5553><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> perishes <S%G622><s%> even though <S%G1161><s%> it is tested <S%G1381><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> fire, <S%G4442><s%> may be found <S%G2147><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> result in <S%G1519><s%> praise, <S%G1868><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>—

whom <S%G3739><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> having <S%G1492><s%> known <S%G1492><s%> you love; <S%G25><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> whom, <S%G3739><s%> though now <S%G737><s%> you don't <S%G3361><s%> see <S%G3708><s%> him, <S%G1161><s%> yet believing, <S%G4100><s%> you rejoice <S%G21><s%> greatly with joy <S%G5479><s%> unspeakable <S%G412><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> full of glory <S%G1392><s%> —
receiving <S%G2865><s%> the result <S%G5056><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> the salvation <S%G4991><s%> of <S%G5590><s%> your souls. <S%G5590><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G3739><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> sought <S%G1567><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> searched diligently, <S%G1830><s%> who prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that would come to <S%G1519><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%>

searching <S%G2045><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what kind of <S%G4169><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in <S%G1722><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> pointed <S%G1213><s%> to, <S%G4303><s%> when he predicted the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the glories <S%G1391><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> would follow them. <S%G3326><s%>

To them <S%G3739><s%> it was revealed, <S%G601><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to themselves, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> to you, <S%G2254><s%> they ministered <S%G1247><s%> these things, <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> have been <S%G312><s%> announced <S%G312><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who preached the Good News <S%G2097><s%> to you <S%G5209><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> sent out <S%G575><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%> which things <S%G3739><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> desire <S%G1937><s%> to look <S%G3879><s%> into. <S%G1519><s%>

Therefore, <S%G1352><s%> prepare <S%G328><s%> <S%G3751><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> minds <S%G1271><s%> for action, <S%G3525><s%> be sober and set your hope <S%G1679><s%> fully <S%G5049><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that will be brought <S%G5342><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>—

as <S%G5613><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of obedience, <S%G5218><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> conforming yourselves according to <S%G4964><s%> your former <S%G4386><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> as in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> ignorance, <S%G52><s%>

but <S%G235><s%> just <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> he who called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> is holy, <S%G40><s%> you <S%G846><s%> yourselves also be <S%G1096><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of your behavior; <S%G391><s%>
because <S%G1360><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "You <S%G1096><s%> shall be holy; <S%G40><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> holy. <S%G40><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you call on <S%G1941><s%> him as Father, <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> without respect of persons <S%G678><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> each man <S%G1538><s%>'s work, <S%G2041><s%> pass <S%G390><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> living <S%G3940><s%> as foreigners here in <S%G1722><s%> reverent fear: <S%G5401><s%>

knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you were <S%G3084><s%> redeemed, <S%G3084><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with corruptible things, <S%G5349><s%> with silver <S%G694><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> gold, <S%G5553><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the useless <S%G3152><s%> way of life <S%G391><s%> handed down from your <S%G5216><s%> fathers, <S%G3970><s%>
but <S%G235><s%> with precious <S%G5093><s%> blood, <S%G5613><s%> as of a faultless <S%G299><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pure <S%G784><s%> lamb, <S%G286><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

who was foreknown <S%G4267><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> was revealed <S%G5319><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the end <S%G2078><s%> of times <S%G5550><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> your sake, <S%G5209><s%>

who <S%G3588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> are believers <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> glory; <S%G1391><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Seeing you have purified <S%G48><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your obedience <S%G5218><s%> to the truth <S%G225><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in sincere <S%G505><s%> brotherly <S%G5360><s%> affection, <S%G25><s%> love <S%G25><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> fervently: <S%G1619><s%>

having been born again, <S%G313><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> corruptible <S%G5349><s%> seed, <S%G4701><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of incorruptible, <S%G862><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which lives <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> remains <S%G3306><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%>

For, <S%G1360><s%> "All <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> is like <S%G5613><s%> grass, <S%G5528><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>'s glory <S%G1391><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> in the grass. <S%G5528><s%> The grass <S%G5528><s%> withers, <S%G3583><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> its <S%G846><s%> flower <S%G438><s%> falls; <S%G1601><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>'s word <S%G4487><s%> endures <S%G3306><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%>" <S%G165><s%> <S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of Good News which <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2097><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>
